parameter.name: stringDotExist
parameter.value: Someone already has that username. Note that we ignore periods and capitalization in usernames. Try another?

parameter.name: stringCorrectChars
parameter.value: Please use only letters (a-z), numbers, and periods.

parameter.name: stringTwoDots
parameter.value: A fan of punctuation! Alas, usernames can't have consecutive periods.

parameter.name: stringNameTaken
parameter.value: That username is taken. Try another.

parameter.name: stringExist
parameter.value: That username is taken. Try another.

parameter.name: stringLastChar
parameter.value: The last character of your username should be a letter (a-z) or number.

parameter.name: stringFirstChar
parameter.value: The first character of your username should be a letter (a-z) or number.
